room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Tactics in Fort Myers
room_description: A notorious mobster has chosen you and your gang to rob the State Bank located right here in Downtown Fort Myers. Donâ€™t let the Big Man down. Think you have the knack to pull off the heist?  Well, if you find yourself to be truly a scholarly wise guy, we present the Escape Room Fort Myers. Lose yourself in a room, thrown back in time, surrounded by 1920s antiques and memories, uncovering the mysteries and wonders that lay in front of you as you experience the Escape Tactics Bank Heist. Ever wonder if it would be that easy?
